error.message: Class Drupal\webform_double_opt_in\Event\GetSubmissionStateEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead

Class Drupal\webform_double_opt_in\Event\GetSubmissionStateOptionsEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Class Drupal\webform_double_opt_in\Event\OptedInEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
The drupal/core requirement is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal. Either remove it or update it to be compatible. See https://drupal.org/node/2514612#s-drupal-9-compatibility.
